- [ ] All existing tests pass (`npm test`)

## Checklist
- [ ] No TODOs or placeholders in code
- [ ] Follows feature module pattern (meta.ts + handler.ts + index.ts) if adding a feature
- [ ] Updated docs if user-facing change
- [ ] No breaking changes (or documented in description)
